data.name: Status.ReadyToCheck
data.comment: Initial status message before checking for updates

data.name: Status.CheckingForUpdates
data.comment: Status message while checking for updates

data.name: Status.UpdateAvailable
data.comment: Status message when update is available. {0} is the version number

data.name: Status.NoUpdatesAvailable
data.comment: Status message when no updates are available

data.name: Status.UpdateCheckFailed
data.comment: Status message when update check fails

data.name: Status.PreparingDownload
data.comment: Status message when preparing to download update

data.name: Progress.PreparingDownload
data.comment: Progress message when preparing download

data.name: Status.UpdatePreparedSuccessfully
data.value: Update prepared successfully! The application will restart automatically.
data.comment: Status message when update is successfully prepared

data.name: Progress.UpdatePreparedSuccessfully
data.value: Update prepared successfully! The application will restart automatically.
data.comment: Progress message when update is successfully prepared

data.name: Status.UpdateInstallationFailed
data.comment: Status message when update installation fails

data.name: Progress.InstallationFailed
data.comment: Progress message when installation fails

data.name: Status.UpdateFailed
data.comment: Status message when update process fails

data.name: Progress.Ready
data.comment: Initial progress message

data.name: Button.InstallUpdate
data.comment: Button text for installing update

data.name: Button.Installing
data.comment: Button text shown while installing

data.name: Error.NoCompatiblePackage
data.value: No compatible update package found for your platform.
data.comment: Error message when no compatible update package is found

data.name: Error.FailedToCheckForUpdates
data.comment: Error message when update check fails. {0} is the error details

data.name: Error.UpdateFailed
data.comment: Error message when update fails. {0} is the error details

data.name: Version.Current
data.comment: Label for current application version

data.name: Version.Latest
data.comment: Label for latest available version

data.name: Version.Default
data.comment: Default version display when no version is available

data.name: Status.UpdateAvailableExclaim
data.comment: Heading when an update is available (with exclamation)

data.name: Label.WhatsNew
data.comment: Label for release notes section

data.name: Description.DefaultUpdateNotes
data.value: This update includes bug fixes, performance improvements, and new features.
data.comment: Default text for update description when no specific notes

data.name: Status.UpToDate
data.comment: Status message when app is already on latest version

data.name: Label.VersionReady
data.comment: Partial text indicating version is ready

data.name: Progress.PercentComplete
data.comment: Partial text for percentage completion
